enWisdom: Hellfire is the final end of the extremists

Wisdom: النَّاجُونَ مِنَ النَّارِ قَلِيلٌ لِغَلَبَةِ الْهَوَى وَالضَّلَالِ
enWisdom: Because of succumbing to vain desire and misguidance, [only a] few will be saved from hellfire

Wisdom: احْذَرُوا نَاراً حَرُّهَا شَدِيدٌ وَقَعْرُهَا بَعِيدٌ وَحُلِيُّهَا حَدِيدٌ
enWisdom: Be wary of the fire whose heat is intense, whose pit is deep and whose ornaments are made of [molten] iron

Wisdom: احْذَرُوا نَاراً لَجَبُهَا [لحبها] عَتِيدٌ وَلَهَبُهَا شَدِيدٌ وَعَذَابُهَا أَبَداً جَدِيدٌ
enWisdom: Be wary of the fire whose tumultuous blaze is ready, its flames are intense and its torment is forever renewed

Wisdom: أَلَا وَإِنِّي لَمْ أَرَ كَالْجَنَّةِ نَامَ طَالِبُهَا وَلَا كَالنَّارِ نَامَ هَارِبُهَا
enWisdom: Indeed, I have not seen any place whose seeker is in slumber like Paradise and any place whose fleer is in slumber like hellfire

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَهْلَ النَّارِ كُلُّ كَفُورٍ مَكُورٍ
enWisdom: Verily all disbelieving schemers are inmates of the fire

Wisdom: كَلَامُهُ ع فِي وَصْفِ جَهَنَّمَ غَمْرٌ قَرَارُهَا مُظْلِمَةٌ أَقْطَارُهَا حَامِيَةٌ قُدُورُهَا فَظِيعَةٌ أُمُورُهَا
enWisdom: He (‘a) also said in his description of hellfire: Its pits are engulfed [with fire], its sides are pitch-dark, its vessels are scorching hot and everything about it is horrid
Every tribulation other than the fire [of hell] is [a means to] wellbeing
Hell is sufficient as a punishment

Wisdom: لَيْسَ لِهَذَا الْجِلْدِ الرَّقِيقِ صَبْرٌ عَلَى النَّارِ
enWisdom: This tender skin does not have the tolerance to withstand the fire [of hell]

Wisdom: فِي وَصْفِ النَّارِ نَارٌ شَدِيدٌ كَلَبُهَا عَالٍ لَجَبُهَا سَاطِعٌ لَهَبُهَا مُتَأَجِّجٌ سَعِيرُهَا مُتَغَيِّظٌ زَفِيرُهَا بَعِيدٌ خُمُودُهَا ذَاكٍ وَقُودُهَا مُتَخَوِّفٌ وَعِيدُهَا
enWisdom: He (‘a) said in his description of hell: [It is] a fire whose burning is intense, its roar is loud, its flames are rising, its blaze is incinerating, its groans are terrifying, its abatement is remote, its fuel is igniting, [and] its horrors are terrifying
The inmates of hell are eternally tormented
The one who enters hellfire is forever wretched

Wisdom: قَالَ ع فِي وَصْفِ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يَظْعَنُ مُقِيمُهَا وَلَا يُفَادَى أَسِيرُهَا وَلَا تُقْصَمُ كُبُولُهَا وَلَا مُدَّةَ لِلدَّارِ فَتَفْنَى وَلَا أَجَلَ لِلْقَوْمِ فَيُقْضَى
enWisdom: He (‘a) said while describing hell: Its inmate cannot leave, its prisoner cannot be released by ransom and its shackles cannot be brokenThis abode has no fixed age so that it may perish, nor is there a lifespan for its inmates that they may pass away
